name: Game no Tatsujin 2
overview: Game no Tatsujin 2 is a collection of digital conversions of seven board games popular in Japan: Shōgi, Igo, Renju, Mahjong, Chess, Reversi (called "Place" in this compilation), and Backgammon. Each game is a straightforward conversion of the real-world game, and includes a variety of configuration and difficulty options. All games other than Mahjong also include a two-player mode. In addition to the standard free mode, there is also a "Tatsujinsen" ("Master Battle") mode where the player can challenge masters of each game at the highest level of difficulty with a fixed set of rules.
